Name: Auto-Staccato
About the game: Auto-Staccato is a badass new take on the rhythm game taking place in a fantasy setting. You must use your weapon or magic to “Fight Your Music” by hitting enemies in time to the beat. Featuring a campaign mode with a mix of worlds and arenas and included music, players can also battle against their own music. Use Your Own Music: Automatic song analysis in an instant without need for any manual editing (mp3, wav and ogg support) High quality music analyzer ensures best possible experience with your favorite songs Gameplay and visuals adapt to the song tone, loudest notes are represented as bosses Two drastically different game modes: lane-based Horde and First-Person Arena Shooter with Easy/Medium/Hard difficulties Campaign Mode with 20 levels and included soundtrack Skill upgrades including Armor, Life Steal, Focus, and Combo Multiplier Bonus 9 Different environments Score high combos to make enemies explode under your attacks
Meta Title: Auto-Staccato: Jan 1, 2018, Birch Log and Full Overview
